author: parithosh
content:
You just need to modify the genesis.json (or equivalent) on the EL side and the config.yaml on the CL side to have the same TTD. Once that's done, the exec chain will fork into the newly setup beaconchain once TTD is hit. 

its a semi-automated process: 
- Genesis files, validator deposits, etc are created here: https://github.com/skylenet/ethereum-genesis-generator/tree/mainnet-shadow-fork
- The chain itself is setup with these scripts: https://github.com/parithosh/consensus-deployment-ansible

author: sky.cactus
content: We really need an Asia/EU time zone mod...

author: protolambda
content: Spam recently is bad because for some reason the “delete all messages by user in last 24h” feature of discord upon banning doesn’t seem to work. So mods have to go through every single channel to remove spam.

author: sky.cactus
content: I usually bump that up to 7 days (or whatever the max is), and it usually works.  I wonder if they just got time zones wrong or something in their code?

author: protolambda
content: will try next time, I wonder if it’s something like that yes

author: sky.cactus
content: Just tried to ban someone in another server and ran into the problem you described, and this was with multi-day ban.  It appears to have only deleted some of their spam messages but not all (at least one, not sure if it deleted more).

author: sky.cactus
content: So I think you may be right that they broke something recently (since the last time I banned a spammer).

author: pandapip1
content: Is automod configured correctly? You should be able to send all spam messages into a moderator review channel now.

content: the default selection is "delete no messages" on mobile, but on desktop its 24h
